Kingsley Nkemjika Abasili bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Naịjirịa
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Kingsley Abasili
A makwaara ya dị ka onye yiri onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Pete Edochie
Ndị na-eme ihe nkiri abụọ a bụ ndị Anambra steeti mana ha abụghị ndị si ofu ezinụlọ
Kingsley bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri gosiputara na ihe nkiri ọtụtụ nke ihe nkiri Nollywood
Kingsley sitere obodo n'Igbo-Ukwu,  dị n'okpuru ọchịchị Aguata nke  Anambra Steeti na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria
Amụrụ ya na Makurdi, Benue State, Nigeria
Kingsley Abasili na-eme ncheta ọmụmụ ya na Junu 30th, nke afọ ọ bụla
Kingsley bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri gosiputara na  ihe nkiri ọtụtụ nke ihe nkiri Nollywood
O nwere nzere bachelọ na nchịkwa ọha, na mahadum Ebonyi State University, Abakaliki

Na March 25th, 2017 ọ kpọkọtara ya na ndị ọzọ ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba nke Political na Adminstrative Studies- International Relations, (Master's Degree), ngalabaSocial Sciences, University of Port Harcourt, Rivers State
N'afọ 2019, kingsley dọtara ndị mgbasa ozi maka myirịta ya na onye na-eme ihe nkiri ochie bụ Pete Edochie
Abasili dị ka pete Edochie nke na-eto eto wee kpọọ ya Onye yiri Pete Edochie na-eme ihe nkiri nke ọma
N'ikpeazụ, Kingsley sonyeere ụlọ ọrụ ihe nkiri Nigeria n'otu afọ wee soro ndị na-eme ihe nkiri Nollywood dị ka Gentle Jack, Emmanuel Ehumadu a maara dị ka Labistar, na ndị ọzọ
N'afọ 2019, ọ pụtara na Try Me dị ka onye isi ụlọ akwụkwọ na Mark Angel's nkenkee nto ọchị yana Dominion Uche na ndị ọzọ

Akpọrọ ya òkù na mmemme Akaraka dị ka ọbịa wee nye ya onyinye nkwanye ùgwù site n'aka Anambra Through a Lens, na 2020 ya na ndị ọzọ natara; Onye ukwu Odeakwụkwọ mgbasa  nke Gọvanọ Anambra steeti, Sir James Eze na ndị ọzọ
Kọmishọna na-asọpụrụ maka ndị ntorobịa na akụnụba dijitalụ, Hon
Afam Mbanefo nyere ndị nwetara ihe nrite a
